Package: com.android.build.gradle.internal

[Java] Class LintGradleProject

      • com.android.build.gradle.internal.LintGradleProject

      • An implementation of Lint's com.android.tools.lint.detector.api.Project class wrapping a Gradle model (project or library)

        • Method Detail

          • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public static com.android.utils.Pair<LintGradleProject, List<File>> create(@com.android.annotations.NonNull LintGradleClient client, @com.android.annotations.NonNull com.android.builder.model.AndroidProject project, @com.android.annotations.NonNull com.android.builder.model.Variant variant, @com.android.annotations.NonNull org.gradle.api.Project gradleProject)

            Creates a LintGradleProject from the given com.android.builder.model.AndroidProject definition for a given com.android.builder.model.Variant, and returns it along with a set of lint custom rule jars applicable for the given model project.

            Parameters:
            client - the client
            project - the model project
            variant - the variant
            gradleProject - the gradle project
            Returns:
            a pair of new project and list of custom rule jars

          • protected static boolean dependsOn(@com.android.annotations.NonNull com.android.builder.model.Dependencies dependencies, @com.android.annotations.NonNull String artifact)
